data.chText: （使）逐渐形成，逐步发展，逐渐演变
data.enText: to develop gradually, especially from a simple to a more complicated form; to develop sth in this way

data.chText: 这种想法是从我在阁楼里发现的一幅画得到启发的。
data.enText: The idea evolved from a drawing I discovered in the attic.

data.chText: 这家公司已逐步发展成一个主要的化工厂。
data.enText: The company has evolved into a major chemical manufacturer.

data.chText: 每个学校必须形成自己的办学方式。
data.enText: Each school must evolve its own way of working.
to develop over time, often many generations, into forms that are better adapted to survive changes in their environment

data.chText: 这三种生物从同一祖先进化而来。
data.enText: The three species evolved from a single ancestor.

data.chText: 海豚已经进化形成高度发达的下颌。
data.enText: The dolphin has evolved a highly developed jaw.

simple_means.memory_skill: e 出 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转出来 → 进化

example: Modern man evolved a long time ago
I acquired a strong aversion to television
Children must develop a sense of right and wrong
Dave developed leadership qualities in his new position
We have developed a new theory of evolution

value.def: When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms.

example.ex: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females...
example.tran: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

example.ex: Maize evolved from a wild grass in Mexico.
example.tran: 玉米是从墨西哥的一种野生禾本植物进化而来的。
当两栖动物进化成爬行动物

value.def: If something evolves or you evolve it, it gradually develops over a period of time into something different and usually more advanced.

example.ex: ...a tiny airline which eventually evolved into Pakistan International Airlines...
example.tran: 最终发展成巴基斯坦国际航空公司的一家小型航空公司

example.ex: Popular music evolved from folk songs...
example.tran: 流行音乐从民歌演变而来。

example.ex: As medical knowledge evolves, beliefs change...
example.tran: 随着医学知识的逐步发展，观念也在发生变化。

example.ex: This was when he evolved the working method from which he has never departed.
example.tran: 就在这个时候，他逐步形成了那种他一直沿用至今的工作方法。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to roll, to turn 卷, 转
rootsaffixes.title: vol, volu, volv, volt

partsOfSpeech.dec: archi〔= arch 弧形〕+ volt 卷，转 → 转成弧形 → 拱门装饰
con 共同 + volv 卷，转 + e → 共同转 → 缠绕
e 出 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 进化
evolution 进化 + ism 学术 → 进化论
e 出 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转出来 → 进化
inter 在…之间 + volv 卷，转 + e → 在两者之间转 → 缠绕
in 进入 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转进去 → 卷入
re 相反 + volt 转 → 反转 → 叛变
re 相反 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 革命
re 一再 + volv 卷，转 + e → 一再转 → 旋转
re 重新 + volv 卷，转 + er 表物 → 旋转连发 → 左轮手枪
volu 卷，转 + ble → 不断流转的 → 话语不断的
vol 卷，转 + ume → 装订成卷 → 卷，册
